goals.complete: Emer Whipmane and I tracked my father to Ashford Forum. We questioned his norn friend Fibharr Ygosson, who told us that the ogres stole the human idol Vallus needs to ransom his comrade back from the Human Separatists. We're heading for the ogre's kraal to retrieve both Vallus and the idol.

We found Vallus Smokemane in a running battle with the ogres. We helped him, but during the commotion he grabbed the idol of Balthazar and ran off. He means to hand it over to human Separatists as ransom for his comrade, but Emer and I are going to stop this exchange and take Vallus into custody.
